author: Special Correspondent
text:
A businessman was robbed of Rs. 23 lakh soon after he withdrew the sum in Padiyanallur near Red Hills on Monday morning.

Police said Mahendran of Balaji Nagar had withdrawn the money from a public sector bank on Grand Northern Trunk Road. Mahendran, the owner of a transport company, kept the cash in a bag and placed it inside his car. He was about to start the car when a stranger informed him that one of his car tyres was flat. “It was a case of attention diversion. He got out of the car and started looking around for a mechanic, leaving the car windows open. When he returned to the car, he realised the bag was missing,” a policeman said. Red Hills police are investigating.
title: Businessman robbed of Rs. 23 lakh
